meanings.definition: The surgical procedure of removing excess fat from specific areas of the body.
meanings.sent1: After the liposuction, her stomach looked slimmer.
meanings.sent2: She underwent liposuction to get rid of the extra fat on her thighs.
meanings.sent3: The liposuction left her feeling lighter than a feather!
meanings.sent4: The liposuction was like a magic vacuum sucking away the fat.
meanings.sent5: The liposuction sculpted her body into a work of art.

meanings.definition: The act of using suction to remove fat cells from the body.
meanings.sent1: The liposuction machine made a humming sound during the procedure.
meanings.sent2: Doctors often recommend liposuction for patients looking to lose weight quickly.
meanings.sent3: The liposuction device seemed to be whispering secrets to the fat cells.
meanings.sent4: The liposuction was like a skilled cleaner sucking up unwanted fat.
meanings.sent5: The liposuction sucked out the fat like a powerful vacuum.
